name: Tenderloin Housing Clinic (THC)
description: The mission of the Tenderloin Housing Clinic is to prevent tenant displacement, to preserve and expand the City's low cost housing stock, and to provide comprehensive legal assistance to low income tenants.
fullDescription: The mission of the Tenderloin Housing Clinic is to prevent tenant displacement, to preserve and expand the City's low cost housing stock, and to provide comprehensive legal assistance to low income tenants.
whatTheyOffer: The mission of the Tenderloin Housing Clinic is to prevent tenant displacement, to preserve and expand the City's low cost housing stock, and to provide comprehensive legal assistance to low income tenants.
